tool_description: 💎Uncover gaming trends with our Steam API. Download prices, DLCs, discounts, reviews. Fuel your project, outperform rivals!
name: Steam Store API
title: Steam Store API

api_list.name: Free to play
api_list.description: Get a full list of free to play games and other free products.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page numbering starts from 0, so the first page is 0.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: To get available country codes, just call the **Country code list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section.

basic_info.short_description:
Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago.

CS: GO features new maps, characters, weapons, and game modes, and delivers updated versions of the classic CS content (de_dust2, etc.).

Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.

Play PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS for free.
Land on strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, and survive to become the last team standing across various, diverse Battlegrounds.
Squad up and join the Battlegrounds for the original Battle Royale experience that only PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS can offer.

War Thunder is the most comprehensive free-to-play, cross-platform, MMO military game dedicated to aviation, armoured vehicles, and naval craft, from the early 20th century to the most advanced modern combat units. Join now and take part in major battles on land, in the air, and at sea.
Destiny 2 is an action MMO with a single evolving world that you and your friends can join anytime, anywhere, absolutely free.

Yu-Gi-Oh! MASTER DUEL is the ultimate free-to-play cross-platform strategy card game with fast-paced Duels, stunning HD graphics and a new, dynamic soundtrack! Get ready to challenge Duelists around the world!

An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android & Steam! Frequent updates. Over fifty Legends.

highlights.trailer_name: Brawlhalla x Avatar: The Last Airbender
BRAWLHALLA X STREET FIGHTER ARE READY TO FIGHT!
Skadoosh! Po, Tigress, and Tai Lung from DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda join the fight in Brawlhalla!

basic_info.short_description: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and battle alongside your friends in this story-driven free-to-play online action game
Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities.  Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!
Battle Royale 2.0, welcome to the CHAOS!
Play with life and discover the possibilities. Unleash your imagination and create a world of Sims that’s wholly unique. Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes–and much more.

highlights.trailer_name: How To Play The Sims 4: Create A Sim Mode Starting Guide
How To Play The Sims 4: Starting Build/Buy Mode Guide

basic_info.short_description: Join our growing community as you explore, play, and help craft the future of social VR.  Create worlds and custom avatars.  Welcome to VRChat.
Embark on an odyssey for the Lost Ark in a vast, vibrant world: explore new lands, seek out lost treasures, and test yourself in thrilling action combat in this action-packed free-to-play RPG.

highlights.trailer_name: Lost Ark: The Witcher Crossover Event
Lost Ark: Wreck the Halls | December Update
Lost Ark: Feast with Friends | November Update
Lost Ark: Mystics and Mayhem | October Update
Lost Ark 101: La historia de Arkesia

basic_info.short_description: Aim Lab is the aim trainer of choice for over 20 Million players, from beginners to esports pros. Our unique aim analysis optimizes your gameplay, targets your weaknesses & builds key skills for any FPS/TPS game, all for free! Time to warm up with our unlimited scenarios & rank up in-game!

Goose, goose, DUCK? A game of social deduction where you and your fellow geese must work together to complete your mission. Keep an eye out for those malicious Mallards and other birds, who have infiltrated your team and will do anything to stop you.
You're a survivor in the zombie infested ruins of society, and must work with your friends and forge alliances to remain among the living.
Get ready to celebrate 9 years of Blitz! Enjoy a series of events, tanks, and gifts, as well as unparalleled retro-futuristic vibes!

highlights.trailer_name: You're never alone. Want to play with a friend? Create a platoon.

basic_info.short_description: Join 40+ million players in SMITE, the Battleground of the Gods! Wield Thor’s hammer, or play as one of 125 other mythological icons. The New Season includes a New Map, New God, New BP & a T5 Event! Become a God and play FREE today!

From "PES" to "eFootball™"
eFootball™ 2023 kicks off!

You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world. With a focus on visceral action combat, powerful items and deep character customization, Path of Exile is completely free and will never be pay-to-win.

highlights.trailer_name: Path of Exile: The Forbidden Sanctum Trailer
Path of Exile: Lake of Kalandra Trailer
Path of Exile: Siege of the Atlas Trailer

basic_info.short_description: Assemble your MARVEL dream team from a super roster of your favorite heroes and villains. MARVEL SNAP is fast-paced, adrenaline-pumping, strategic card battler that puts you in control of it all - make your move.

Deep within the SCP Foundation during a containment breach, many of the anomalies have bypassed security and escaped from their chambers - without peaceful intentions. Become site personnel, a re-containment agent, or an anomalous entity and fight to take control of or escape the facility!

Immerse yourself in thrilling naval battles and assemble an armada of over 600 ships from the first half of the 20th century — from stealthy destroyers to gigantic battleships. Change the look of your ship, choose upgrades to suit your play style, and go into battle with other players!

Albion Online is a fantasy sandbox MMORPG featuring a player-driven economy, classless combat system, and intense PvP battles. Explore a vast open world full of danger and opportunity. Grow your wealth, forge alliances, and leave your mark on the world of Albion.

This is a free-to-play team battle action game based on the "Mobile Suit Gundam" series of the Universal Century.
Whether by land or by space, lay waste to your foes using either your favorite Mobile Suit or roam the battlefield as infantry and capture important objectives.

highlights.trailer_name: Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation 2 - Network Test Trailer
Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation 2 - Launch Trailer

basic_info.short_description: Join 50+ million players in Paladins, the free-to-play fantasy team-based shooter sensation. Wield guns and magic as a legendary Champion of the Realm, customizing your core set of abilities to play exactly how you want to play.

highlights.trailer_name: Paladins - Champion Trailer - Play Free Now
Paladins - Rei Cinematic Trailer - Play Free Now
Paladins - Go To War Trailer - Play Free Now

basic_info.short_description: Explore, adapt, and survive in Undawn, a free-to-play open-world survival RPG for mobile and PC developed by LightSpeed Studios and published by Level Infinite. Embark on an adventure with other survivors four years after a worldwide disaster where hordes of infected roam a shattered world.

Gather a squad and fight for survival in We're All Going To Die. Work together with a squad using abilities, equipment and exploring different levels to make the most of your fight against your demise, after all, you're all going to die at some point.

highlights.trailer_name: We're All Going To DIe Trailer 1

basic_info.short_description: Russian Fishing 4 is a fishing simulator with RPG elements. There is no story line and the whole process is based on the concept of an open, free to roam and free to play game.

Fatal Core is a 100% free, community-driven Trading Card Game. Assume the role of one of 6 Lead Characters and battle in a dystopian future full of strange magic and alien technology! Fatal Core features many unusual mechanics, including simultaneous play, open hands, player market, and more.
The legendary Halo series returns with the most expansive Master Chief campaign yet and a ground-breaking free to play multiplayer experience.

Join fast-paced action-packed combat. Play Combat Master -- AAA experience on any hardware. Best-in-class multiplayer gunfight. Next-level extreme performance. Lightning-speed loading time and a whole lot more.

Join the footbrawl! Smash opponents off the arena and score goals in this lightning-fast 3v3 free-to-play game. Squad up with friends and choose from a growing cast of colorful Strikers to sling slimes, toss tofu, and rocket boost to victory.

highlights.trailer_name: Omega Strikers | Official Launch Gameplay Trailer
Studio TRIGGER Animated Opening for Omega Strikers

basic_info.short_description:
Four million battles every day. One Shadowverse. Japan's #1 strategic card game.
Made by card gamers for card gamers.

STAR WARS™: The Old Republic™ is a free-to-play MMORPG that puts you at the center of your own story-driven saga. Play as a Jedi, Sith, Bounty Hunter, or one of many other iconic STAR WARS roles in the galaxy far, far away over three thousand years before the classic films.

Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing!

Create an island full of Singing Monsters, then watch your song evolve as you breed and upgrade them. Design and build unique decorations to make your world look just the way you want. You'll love exploring the wonderful fantasy land of the Monster World!

store_items.name: ヘブンバーンズレッド

basic_info.short_description:
Key 麻枝 准が描く、最後の希望を託された少女たちの物語『ヘブンバーンズレッド （ヘブバン）』
フィールドを駆け回り、かけがえのない日常を体験しながら、命を賭した戦いに挑むドラマチックRPG！

highlights.trailer_name: 『ヘブンバーンズレッド』ファイナルトレーラー

basic_info.short_description: Welcome to the ultimate FNAF mashup, featuring 50 selectable characters and custom difficulties!
Fallout Shelter puts you in control of a state-of-the-art underground Vault from Vault-Tec. Build the perfect Vault, keep your Dwellers happy, and protect them from the dangers of the Wasteland.
Muck is a survival-roguelike. Collect resources, find items & build a base to survive for as long as you can.

A love letter to classic NES games! 
Explore an ever-expanding, challenging maze filled with countless secrets.

Fishing Planet® is a free-to-play and highly realistic first-person online multiplayer fishing simulator. Developed by avid fishing enthusiasts to bring you the full thrill of actual angling on your PC.
Crossout - the post-apocalyptic MMO Action game! Craft your unique battle machines from dozens of interchangeable parts and destroy your enemies in explosive PvP online battles!

Take on Duelists around the world with "Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links"!
Step into a world that crosses dimensions and connects all Duelists. In Duel World, any location transforms into a Duel Field where heated Duels unfold!
Build the strongest team of pets and tussle with your friends!
Crab Game is a First-Person Multiplayer game where you play through several different minigames based on children's games, until only one player stands victorious.

The King of Rahil is looking for a Summoner to protect the kingdom against Tefo's enormous conspiracy.
 Your story as a Rahil Guard begins now! Explore a vast world with your Summoned companions by your side in this new Action RPG set in the Summoners War Universe.

Magic: The Gathering Arena empowers you to discover your strategy, meet the planeswalkers, explore the multiverse, and battle friends around the world. Start playing for free, challenge your friends, unlock cards, and feel the magic of the original fantasy CCG!

highlights.trailer_name: March of the Machine Official Cinematic

basic_info.short_description: Take over the world in RISK Global Domination, the iconic strategy board game.

api_list.name: Search items (🔥)
api_list.description:
👉 This is one of the most important endpoints. Retrieve data from the Steam search engine. The filters here have a powerful impact. With their use you can find anything that interests you. If you want to limit the games to a certain amount, read the description of maxPrice parameter below.

Maximum number of results served from one call is 50. But very often the number of results is lower because we skip game packs (bundles) in the search engine. If you're interested in this, let us know.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: To get available country codes, just call the **Country code list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: Search for items containing a given term/phrase/query

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page numbering starts from 0, so the first page is 0.

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: Limit games to price. To get the allowed maximum price value for the selected currency go to the search results: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?term=witcher&ndl=1 and find the 'Narrow by Price' filter.

optional_parameters.name: tagIds
optional_parameters.description: You can narrow down the results to selected tags. Enter here, after a comma, the ids of the tags from the endpoint: **Tags** -> Tag list

optional_parameters.name: supportedLang
optional_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section. You can add multiple languages separated by commas, e.g. ***english,french,german**

optional_parameters.name: os
optional_parameters.description: Allowed values: **empty, win, mac, linux***. You can provide several OS separated by comma, e.g. **win,mac**. Leave the field empty if you don't want to use this filter.

test_endpoint.title: One or more validation errors occurred.

api_list.name: Achievement list
api_list.description: Returns a full list of achievements with information on what needs to be done to get the achievement and what percentage of players have achieved it.

required_parameters.name: appid
required_parameters.description: 292030 is 'The Witcher® 3: Wild Hunt' AppId

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: To get available country codes, just call the **Country code list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section.

achievements.name: Butcher of Blaviken
achievements.task: Kill at least 5 opponents in under 10 seconds.

achievements.name: Let's Cook!
achievements.task: Learn 12 potion formulae.

achievements.name: Fist of the South Star
achievements.task: Defeat an opponent in a fistfight without taking any damage.

achievements.name: Can't Touch This!
achievements.task: Kill 5 foes in a fight without taking damage (except for Toxicity) and without using the Quen Sign.

achievements.name: Bookworm
achievements.task: Read 30 books, journals or other documents.

achievements.name: Bombardier
achievements.task: Collect the formulae for 6 different bomb types.

achievements.name: Shrieker
achievements.task: Complete the contract on the shrieker.

achievements.name: Environmentally Unfriendly
achievements.task: Kill 50 opponents using the environment (e.g. swamp gas, insects or objects).

achievements.name: Mutant
achievements.task: Fill all mutagen slots.

achievements.name: Fire in the Hole
achievements.task: Destroy 10 monster nests using bombs.

achievements.name: Globetrotter
achievements.task: Discover 100 fast travel points.

achievements.name: The Doppler Effect
achievements.task: Resolve the doppler problem in Novigrad.

achievements.name: Munchkin
achievements.task: Reach character development level 35.

achievements.name: Passed the Trial
achievements.task: Finish the game on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Fearless Vampire Slayer
achievements.task: Complete the contract on Sarasti.

achievements.name: Ashes to Ashes
achievements.task: Complete the contract on Therazane.

achievements.name: The Witcher's Gone South
achievements.task: Travel to the Duchy of Toussaint.

achievements.name: Fiend or Foe?
achievements.task: Complete the contract on Morvudd.

achievements.name: Armed and Dangerous
achievements.task: Find and equip all the elements of one set of witcher gear.

achievements.name: Geralt and Friends
achievements.task: Win a round of gwent using only neutral cards.

achievements.name: All In
achievements.task: Play three hero cards in one round of gwent and win the match.

achievements.name: Brawler
achievements.task: Defeat Olaf, the Skellige champion of unarmed combat.

achievements.name: Weapon "W"
achievements.task: Develop a mutation.

achievements.name: Brawl Master
achievements.task: Complete all fistfighting quests in Velen, Skellige and Novigrad.

achievements.name: Playing House
achievements.task: Use all available options for developing Corvo Bianco.

achievements.name: Last Action Hero
achievements.task: Be decorated with the Order of Vitis Vinifera.

achievements.name: Woodland Spirit
achievements.task: Complete the contract on the Woodland Spirit.

achievements.name: Embodiment of the Five Virtues
achievements.task: Be given Aerondight by the Lady of the Lake.

achievements.name: A Knight to Remember
achievements.task: Obtain a flawless victory in all the competitions during the knights' tourney.

achievements.name: Gwent Master
achievements.task: Defeat Tybalt and win the gwent tournament held at the Passiflora.

achievements.name: Fast and Furious
achievements.task: Win all the horse races in the game.

achievements.name: Even Odds
achievements.task: Kill 2 monsters you have a contract on without using Signs, potions, mutagens, oils or bombs.

achievements.name: Dressed to Kill
achievements.task: Unlock the bonus for equipping all the witcher gear elements from one School.

achievements.name: Pest Control
achievements.task: Destroy all monster nests in the Velen / Novigrad region, or in Skellige.

achievements.name: Turned Every Stone
achievements.task: Find all grandmaster diagrams for each witcher school.

achievements.name: Dendrologist
achievements.task: Acquire all the Abilities in one tree.

achievements.name: I Have a Gwent Problem
achievements.task: Collect all the cards in the Skellige deck.

achievements.name: Ran the Gauntlet
achievements.task: Finish the game on the "Blood and Broken Bones!" or "Death March!" difficulty levels.

achievements.name: Killed It
achievements.task: Win a round of gwent with a total strength of at least 187.

achievements.name: Power Overwhelming
achievements.task: Have all possible Place of Power bonuses active at the same time.

achievements.name: Card Collector
achievements.task: Acquire all gwent cards available in the base version of the game.

achievements.name: Kaer Morhen Trained
achievements.task: Perform 10 effective counterattacks in a row without getting hit or parrying.

achievements.name: Can Quit Anytime I Want
achievements.task: Be under the influence of seven potions or decoctions at the same time.

achievements.name: Walked the Path
achievements.task: Finish the game on the "Death March!" difficulty level.

achievements.name: Return to Sender
achievements.task: Kill 3 opponents with their own arrows.

achievements.name: That Is the Evilest Thing
achievements.task: Ignite the gas produced by a Dragon's Dream bomb using a burning opponent. Do this 10 times.

achievements.name: Kling of the Clink
achievements.task: Serve time in Toussaint.

achievements.name: Overkill
achievements.task: Make an opponent suffer from bleeding, poisoning and burning simultaneously. Do this 10 times.

achievements.name: The Enemy of My Enemy
achievements.task: Use the Axii Sign to force one opponent to kill another. Do this 20 times.

achievements.name: I Wore Ofieri Before It Was Cool
achievements.task: Collect all available Ofieri armor and horse gear, and at least one Ofieri sword.

achievements.name: Humpty Dumpty
achievements.task: Kill 10 opponents by knocking them off somewhere high with the Aard Sign.

achievements.name: Master Marksman
achievements.task: Kill 50 human and nonhuman opponents by striking them in the head with a crossbow bolt.

test_endpoint.message: You have exceeded the rate limit per minute for your plan, BASIC, by the API provider

api_list.name: User reviews
api_list.description: 💡 The endpoint returns a complete list of user reviews. Use filters to narrow down the results as desired. If you want to get reviews from page 2, you must first grab data from page 1 and save the **cursor** value from response. Then set in the new call  **page=2** and **cursor** from page 1.

required_parameters.name: languageFilter
required_parameters.description: Additional filter for user reviews.  To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section. You can also use here **All** and **Default** values.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: To get available country codes, just call the **Country code list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: appId
required_parameters.description: 292030 is 'The Witcher® 3: Wild Hunt' AppId

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page numbering starts from 0, so the first page is 0.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor is used to retrieve the next page of reviews. If you need to retrieve page 3, you must first retrieve pages 1 and 2 and use the returned cursor values sequentially. Or **simply query** page 1 and get the special link we have prepared for you in the response: **links -> more**. Use it in the API to fetch the next page.

test_endpoint.message: You have exceeded the rate limit per minute for your plan, BASIC, by the API provider

api_list.name: Items by tag (🔥)
api_list.description: 👉 This is one of the most important endpoints. It returns games and other products based on the provided **TagID** . You can find the **TagID** by calling the **Tag list** endpoint from the **Tags** section. You can also specify which tab you're interested in by setting the appropriate **tab** value.

required_parameters.description: To get available country codes, just call the **Country code list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page numbering starts from 0, so the first page is 0.

required_parameters.name: tagId
required_parameters.description: TagId **19** means **Action**

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section.

api_list.name: Country code list
api_list.description: Use this codes in other endpoints to grab data from the country of your interest. The country code is very **important** because it determines the **currency** in which prices will be displayed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com/country-codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com/country-codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.message: You have exceeded the rate limit per minute for your plan, BASIC, by the API provider

api_list.name: Language list
api_list.description: Returns a full list of available languages. Use them in other endpoints to retrieve data in the language you're interested in.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tag list
api_list.description:
Retrieve the full list of tags. Use the tag IDs to handle other endpoints. If you want to get all the games e.g. with **Action** tag, just:
- retrieve the list
- find the Action tag 
- take its ID 
- put it into **Items by tag** endpoint
It's so simple!

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: To get available languages, just call the **Language list** endpoint from **General** section.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: To get available country codes, just call the **Country code list** endpoint from **General** section.
